resources.string: Enter a name for a list
Input a list name. This name will later be used to identify the list for functions.
You currently do not have a list, press the + icon on bottom right of screen to start.

Input your first value below. Then press enter to create another data point in the list. When finished simply click the view_list header button to take you back to your lists.

 NOTE: Your data is automatically saved into the list and viewable in List Show menu. There is no way to undo changes at this moment.
